actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend for one year the authorization for the National Center for Productivity and Quality of Working Life, and to allow for the transfer of the functions of the Center within the Federal Government.

summary.text: Amends the National Productivity and Quality of Working Life Act of 1975 to extend the National Center for Productivity and Quality of Working Life through fiscal year 1979. Authorizes the President to transfer the functions, staff and property of the Center to departments and agencies of the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to extend for one year the authorization for the National Center for Productivity and Quality of Working Life, and to allow for the transfer of the functions of the Center within the Federal Government.
